name: viseron
description: Viseron is a self-hosted surveillance system with real-time object detection. It ingests camera streams, performs AI detection, and exposes recorded events and snapshots via a web interface.

features.title: Object Detection
features.description: Detect people, vehicles, and objects in camera streams using AI models

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Analyze camera feeds in real-time for immediate detection and alerts

features.title: Motion Detection
features.description: Trigger recording and alerts based on motion in specific zones

features.title: Recording
features.description: Record video clips when objects are detected or motion occurs

features.title: Snapshots
features.description: Capture still images of detected events for quick review

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: View live streams, recordings, and events through a web dashboard

features.title: Multiple Cameras
features.description: Monitor multiple camera streams simultaneously from one interface

features.title: Zone Configuration
features.description: Define detection zones to ignore irrelevant areas and reduce false alerts
